other: This script uses a 'fetchRestarts.sh' script for fetching restart files
The script uses a temporary directory on the 'scratch-shared' storage for copying scripts and data
The script uses rclone to backup files to Google Drive (optional)
The script uses rsync to copy output files to the output folder
The script uses srun to run LaMEM with 64 cores
The script defines several functions for different tasks
The script uses a 'MODEL_PARAM_FILE' variable to specify the parameter file for LaMEM
The script uses a 'MODEL_NAME' variable to specify the model name
The script uses an 'INPUT_FOLDER' variable to specify the input folder
The script uses an 'OUTPUT_FOLDER' variable to specify the output folder
The script uses a 'RESTART_FOLDER' variable to specify the restart folder
